00011 // color.cpp*
00012 #include "color.h"
00013 // Spectrum Method Definitions
00014 ostream &operator<<(ostream &os, const Spectrum &s) {
00015         for (int i = 0; i < COLOR_SAMPLES; ++i) {
00016                 os << s.c[i];
00017                 if (i != COLOR_SAMPLES-1)
00018                         os << ", ";
00019         }
00020         return os;
00021 }
00022 float Spectrum::XWeight[COLOR_SAMPLES] = {
00023         0.412453f, 0.357580f, 0.180423f
00024 };
00025 float Spectrum::YWeight[COLOR_SAMPLES] = {
00026         0.212671f, 0.715160f, 0.072169f
00027 };
00028 float Spectrum::ZWeight[COLOR_SAMPLES] = {
00029         0.019334f, 0.119193f, 0.950227f
00030 };
00031 Spectrum FromXYZ(float x, float y, float z) {
00032         float c[3];
00033         c[0] =  3.240479f * x + -1.537150f * y + -0.498535f * z;
00034         c[1] = -0.969256f * x +  1.875991f * y +  0.041556f * z;
00035         c[2] =  0.055648f * x + -0.204043f * y +  1.057311f * z;
00036         return Spectrum(c);
00037 }
